/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function() {
    Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {
        title: 'Fit Layout',
        width: 300,
        height: 150,
        layout: 'fit',
        items: {
            title: 'Inner Panel',
            html: 'This is the inner panel content',
            bodyPadding: 20,
            border: false
        },
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
